title: I can't join to pbe website
body: I want to play pbe and I go to pbe website to sign up.and I tell me that golems are trying to fix it. How I can fix it. Please help.

replies.body: The site may think you're visiting from another region depending on how you logged in.  I recommend logging out completely then going directly to the[ EUNE League Page](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/) then login.  From there, you should be able to access the PBE page without issue.  Just in case, what link are you using to get to the PBE?  Let me know!
